reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweatshirt dress cute, comfortable, and made of sweatshirt material that's not flimsy. They appreciate its versatility, noting it can be dressed up or worn casually, and one customer mentions it pairs well with leggings. The fit and length receive mixed feedback - while some find it true to size, others say it runs big, and while some like the length, others find it too short.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great material, comfy, true to size
items.body: This is a very cute dress. I was a little hesitant after I read some reviews about it just looking frumpy and not flattering but went ahead and took a chance and I’m glad I did! It’s a very good quality material and very soft. It’s also as flattering as you would expect a sweater dress to be! It didn’t feel frumpy to me either. I am 5’4 and I think it could be maybe an inch shorter but I’m okay with the length how it is. It’s true to size. It’s meant to be a little oversized, but it’s not huge and baggy. A medium was a good fit for my height. Overall very impressed with the quality and comfort! It will be a winter/fall staple for sure! Read more
items.author: lydia b.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fall casual dress
items.body: Love this little dress! It's a little big but that's okay I wanted it that way I wanted that lucer fall feel. Looks really cute with flats with tennis shoes or with boots. Wear it by itself with a long necklace or put on a cute vest with it. Or leather jacket. I receive a lot of compliments! It washes very well and it runs true to size with a loose feel. Read more
items.author: T.A. E.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Color not as pictured.
items.body: Cute. Comfy. A smidge short, but can wear with leggings. A little bummed that the black doesn’t have the white wrist cuffs or neckline as pictured, but not a deal breaker. Read more
items.author: Ashley

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable!
items.body: Absolutely love the comfort and quality of this shirt! Nicer enough to look a little dressed up. I would love to get more. Seems to run true to size. Read more
items.author: eddy

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not flattering
items.body: Does not look like the model. I'm a medium, 5'6, 155 lbs, and this just looked frumpy on me. I ordered my normal medium, and it was a clown dress. I returned and ordered a small, but then it was just ill-fitting. I wanted this to work, because it was so cute on the model. The fabric and color were fine, my issue was the silhouette is not flattering. Read more
items.author: LouAnn Covington

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great basic for Fall! Warm and comfortable!
items.body: Warm and thick. Sleeves a little long, but a nice casual dress for cooler weather. Exactly as pictured. Size is generous. No need to size up. Flounce is nice, not too voluminous as some can be. Read more
items.author: Sarah

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not a Win
items.body: Adorable in the pics, but fit is super boxy and not very flattering. Length was also not the best even on a tall person like me. Material was not soft and a bit rough to the touch. Returned. Read more
items.author: Jen Wetzel

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to throw on with tennis shoes and go...
items.body: Love the material and fit of this dress. I am 5'5" tall and 140 lbs and the medium is perfect. The material is perfect for a fall day. Cute with tennis shoes. Read more
items.author: Customer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Blue, Dark Grey, Black, Navy Blue, Sea Green, Dark Brown, Red, Ashleigh Blue, Pink, White, Purple, Color Block Black, Color Block White, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
